about.summary: Provides functionality to assert conditions that have to be met so that errors in data used in analysis pipelines can fail quickly. Similar to 'stopifnot()' but more powerful, friendly, and easier for use in pipelines.

name: r-assertr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.7" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-assertr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/assertr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/assertr/assertr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: abe189091592753b6abc0c5b542728da3801310769141cd66181a946da4506f5

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-dplyr >=0.7.0
    - r-rlang >=0.3.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-dplyr >=0.7.0
    - r-rlang >=0.3.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('assertr')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('assertr')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/ropensci/assertr
  license: MIT
  summary: Provides functionality to assert conditions that have to be met so that errors in
    data used in analysis pipelines can fail quickly. Similar to 'stopifnot()' but more
    powerful, friendly, and easier for use in pipelines.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - xhochy

# Package: assertr
# Type: Package
# Title: Assertive Programming for R Analysis Pipelines
# Version: 2.6
# Authors@R: person("Tony", "Fischetti", email="tony.fischetti@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre"))
# Description: Provides functionality to assert conditions that have to be met so that errors in data used in analysis pipelines can fail quickly. Similar to 'stopifnot()' but more powerful, friendly, and easier for use in pipelines.
# URL: https://github.com/ropensci/assertr
# BugReports: https://github.com/ropensci/assertr/issues
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# ByteCompile: TRUE
# LazyData: TRUE
# Depends: R (>= 3.1.0)
# Imports: dplyr (>= 0.7.0), MASS, stats, utils, rlang (>= 0.3.0)
# Suggests: knitr, testthat, magrittr
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# Encoding: UTF-8
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-01-22 20:24:57 UTC; tonyfischetti
# Author: Tony Fischetti [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: Tony Fischetti <tony.fischetti@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-01-22 20:50:06 UTC
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
